dcterms:creator: J. Li
S. Ji
T. Du
B. Li
T. Wang
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of user reviews extracted from IMDb, a renowned platform for film enthusiasts to rate and critique movies. Each entry in the dataset represents a review provided by a user who has rated a particular film, including details such as the user's rating and textual commentary expressing their opinion.
dcterms:title: IMDB Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Gao
J. Lanchantin
M. L. Soffa
Y. Qi
dcterms:description: The AG News dataset consists of news articles from various sources covering a diverse range of topics including finance, politics, and global events. Each article is categorized into one of four classes, providing a broad representation of news content.
dcterms:title: AG News Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Ren
Y. Deng
K. He
W. Che
dcterms:description: The Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST-2) is a meticulously annotated corpus designed for comprehensive sentiment analysis in natural language processing tasks. It comprises sentences extracted from movie reviews, each associated with a binary sentiment classification.
dcterms:title: SST2 Dataset
